Description:
PRESTIGE FAMILY LIVING WITH ALL THE EXTRAS!
Situated in Carlisle Park, this immaculate 3 bedroom home plus study is the ideal home for a family that expects nothing but the best! Upon entry you are welcomed by a large formal living area which is positioned adjacent to your generous sized master bedroom. The master comes complete with a big walk in wardrobe and a full en suite fitted with an oversized shower space and heated globes.
The hostess kitchen is a chef's dream and is complete with quality stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, 700mm range hood and a 5-burner gas cook top with a 900mm oven, tiled splash back, ample cupboard/storage options. All of this and a whole lot more overlooking the separate meals and living zone.
If you love to entertain then you are sure to enjoy the amount of space on offer both inside and out. With two separate pergola areas there will always be more than enough room for the entire family to take advantage of. The main outdoor entertaining area is completely enclosed which includes both heating and cooling. There is also a grand capacity to accommodate additional cars with the option of using the rear roller door to park extras while using the side access for boats or caravans.
Added extras include ducted heating and evaporative cooling, ceiling fans throughout, down lights, side access, water tank, block out blinds and film on front tinted windows, utility and garden shed, low maintenance rear and front yard, neutral tones throughout plus much more!
The property itself is within close proximity to the Monash Freeway, South Gippsland Highway, Cranbourne Home Markers Centre and Spring Hill Shopping Centre. It is also positioned perfectly for access to schools such as Carlisle Primary, Courtney Gardens Primary and Lyndhurst Secondary Collage.
This is a tremendous opportunity for a family who insists on nothing but the best!

**UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT**
CRANBOURNE CENTRAL: Positioned slap, bang right in the heart of the town centre this unit provides a tempting proposition for first home buyers and investors. Within walking distance to a long list of local amenities the location truly is 2nd to none!
Neat and tidy with some worthy recent updates, the property itself offers instant comfort with the bonus potential for the lucky new owner to add their own personal spin on things!

There's even enough space to add a breakfast table if you like! The 2 genuine bedrooms feature built in robes and don't forget the pristine bathroom, separate toilet and the full laundry.
Step outside and be greeted by a single garage, a grass free courtyard with an undercover area and plenty of space to relax or entertain in private!
If you believe in the age old theory that good real estate revolves around a central location in a fast growing community then you won't be disappointed! Within moments to Narre Warren - Cranbourne Road providing direct access to the shopping facilities situated at Thompsons Parkway and the Hunt Club Village.
The recently revamped Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre is only a brisk walk away and offers the best of the best when it comes to local eating spots. On top of this there is a plethora of public/private schooling and tafe options to select from, easy access to South Gippsland/Westernport Highways and local bus stops enroute to the Cranbourne train station. Not to mention the child care centres and medical facilities that are all close by!
